text: BTW, just to continue/end the thread more gracefully, the discussion with <@U1ENXTQRL> (Carlos) continues separately, with more specific questions related to his use-case (, that is, the not-so-crazy-imho-idea ;-))

On a different note, christophera has just published the link to last week's session, so I'm sharing it here and pinning as well:

<@U0UFDAS91>:  Thanks again!
